channel.title: early modern on Gladio Free Europe
channel.description: Recent content in early modern on Gladio Free Europe

item.title: New Smyrna, A Greek Colony in Florida?
item.description: We look at a number of brutal episodes in early Florida colonial history highlighting New Smyrna, an attempt to built an agricultural colony with Greek indentured servants.

item.title: Queen Christina and the Swedish Empire ft. Anton
item.description: Matt Christman gives us the lay of the land in Central Europe in the period of the 30 Years’ War through reference to the 1971 film <!-- raw HTML omitted -->The Last Valley<!-- raw HTML omitted -->.
